Drummers By Whom I Have Been Intruiged

These are in no particular order, except the top five; those are my for-realzies top five.

  1. George Hurley (Minutemen/fIREHOSE)
  2. Bill Stevenson (ALL/Descendents)
  3. Damon Che (Don Caballero)
  4. John Wright (NoMeansNo)
  5. Tim Solyan (Victim’s Family)
  6. Mac McNeilly (Jesus Lizard)
  7. Stew Copeland (Police)
  8. Jim Kimball (Mule/Denison-Kimball Trio)
  9. Bruce Gary (The Knack)
  10. Earl Hudson (Bad Brains)
  11. Brant Bjork (Fu Manchu)
  12. Scott Reeder (Fu Manchu)
  13. Buddy Rich
  14. Tatsuya Yoshida (Ruins)
  15. Dave Lombardo (Slayer)
  16. Matt Cameron (Soundgarden)
  17. Dan Bitney (Tar Babies)
  18. Dale Crover (Melvins)
  19. Rat Scabies (Damned)
  20. Mike Joyce (Smiths)
  21. Stephen Moses (Alice Donut)
  22. Derrick Decker (Branch Manager)
  23. Sebastian Thomson (Trans Am)
  24. Dan Peters (Mudhoney)
  25. Dave Mello (Schlong/Operation Ivy)
  26. Dave Gleza (MyName/Victim’s Family)
  27. Nicky Scott (PopDefect)
  28. Mac McNeilly (Jesus Lizard)
  29. Chris Pederson (Camper van Beethoven/Monks of Doom)
  30. Sara Lund (Unwound)
  31. Lucky Lehrer (Circle Jerks)
  32. Greg Saunier (Deerhoof)
  33. D.H. Peligro (Dead Kennedys)
  34. Jean-Paul Gaster (Clutch, Bakerton Group)
  35. Jay Lane (later Primus)
  36. Russell Simins (JSBX)
  37. Neil Peart (Rush)
  38. Ted Miller (Satan’s Pilgrims)
  39. Michael Dahlquist (Silkworm)
  40. Barrett Martin (Skin Yard)
  41. DJ Bonebrake (X)
  42. Stephen Perkins (Jane’s Addiction)
  43. John Sherman (Red Fang)
  44. Tim Alexander
  45. Bryan “Brain” Mantia (Primus)
  46. Phil Rudd (AC/DC)
  47. Jon Fishman (Phish)
  48. Jack Irons (early Red Hot Chili Peppers)
  49. John “Drumbo” French (Captain Beefheart)
  50. Jeff Nelson (Minor Threat)
  51. Alex Van Halen (Van Halen)
  52. Rey Washam (BigBoys/Scratch Acid)
  53. Victor DiLorenzo (Violent Femmes)
  54. Murph (Dinosaur Jr)
  55. Lyman Hardy (Ed Hall)
  56. Greg Saenz (Excel)
  57. Nate Smith (Vulfpeck/Fearless Flyers)
  58. Dave Berg (House of Large Sizes)
  59. Howie Klein (Poster Children)
  60. Topper Headon (Clash)
  61. Louis Cole (solo, Knower)
  62. Bernard “Pretty” Purdie (session)
  63. Orestes Morfin (Bitch Magnet)
  64. Greg Clifford (White Denim)
  65. Keith Carlock (session)
  66. John Schier (Last of the Juanitas)
  67. Brian Chippendale (Lightning Bolt)
  68. Zach Hill (Hella)
  69. Simon Allen (New Mastersounds)
  70. Brann Dailor (Mastodon)
  71. Joey Waronker (Walt Mink)
  72. Spit Stix (Fear/Nasalrod)
  73. Chris Mars (Replacements)

Drummers who I can’t identify by name but have blown me away:

  • The drummer on C. W. McCall’s songs “The Silverton”, “Four Wheel Drive”, “Wolf Creek Pass”, “Classified”
  • Whoever played in Steve Miller Band on songs like “Swingtown”, “Take the Money and Run”, “The Joker” (Wikipedia says John King)
